title: Add tool calling documentation and examples
description:
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** comprehensive documentation on tool calling features
**So that** I understand how to configure, use, and extend tool calling safely

**Context:**
Tool calling is a powerful but potentially dangerous feature. Users need clear documentation covering:
- What tools are available
- How to configure tool settings
- Security implications and best practices
- How to approve/deny tool requests
- How to add custom tools
- Troubleshooting common issues

**Technical Notes:**
- Add docs/tools.md with comprehensive guide
- Update README.md with tool calling overview
- Add example configurations to docs/examples/
- Document security model and risks
- Provide custom tool development guide
- Add troubleshooting section
- Include screenshots/examples

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** I'm new to Consoul tool calling
**When** I read docs/tools.md
**Then** I understand how to enable and configure tools safely

**Given** I want to customize tool security
**When** I check configuration examples
**Then** I see examples of whitelist/blacklist/timeout settings

**Given** I want to create a custom tool
**When** I read the developer guide
**Then** I can implement a new tool with proper validation

**Given** tool execution fails
**When** I check troubleshooting section
**Then** I find solutions for common errors

**Files to Create:**
- docs/tools.md
- docs/examples/tool-calling-config.yaml
- docs/examples/custom-tool-example.py

**Files to Modify:**
- README.md (add tool calling section)
- docs/configuration.md (add tools configuration)

Story Points: 2
